lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said Heinz-Japan is "making a profit and generating its first substantial dividends," and implementation of a new partnership, Seoul-Heinz Ltd, is moving ahead with a new manufacturing plant targeted for completion by June in Seoul, South Korea.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: O'Reilly told analysts Heinz is in active negotiations to build a second plant in China, where it entered a joint venture with the government in 1984, forming Heinz-UFE Ltd, which produces dry baby food cereal.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: H.J. Heinz Co is "within sight of our 22nd consecutive year of new records in financial growth" for the fiscal year ending April 30, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Anthony O'Reilly told investment analysts.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said Heinz-Japan is "making a profit and generating its first substantial dividends," and implementation of a new partnership, Seoul-Heinz Ltd, is moving ahead with a new manufacturing plant targeted for completion by June in Seoul, South Korea.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: O'Reilly told analysts Heinz is in active negotiations to build a second plant in China, where it entered a joint venture with the government in 1984, forming Heinz-UFE Ltd, which produces dry baby food cereal.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: H.J. Heinz Co is "within sight of our 22nd consecutive year of new records in financial growth" for the fiscal year ending April 30, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Anthony O'Reilly told investment analysts.
